Samascott Orchards has been farming in the Hudson Valley for over 200 years. Our family takes pride in growing the finest fruits and vegetables using sustainable practices passed down through six generations. Visit us for crisp apples, sweet corn, juicy peaches, and our famous fresh-pressed cider.
